name: Loot!
description:
Use the arrow keys to get to the coin on the other side. You can hold the down arrow while on the ground to move slower and hold the spacebar while in the air to slow your decent if needed. 

If done correctly, you can get a large jump if you try to jump while touching the side of a platform. This may or may not help you.

Character sprite from https://www.kenney.nl
